title: Request Academic Integrity Consultation
description: A faculty member suspects a student of plagiarism and wants to consult with the academic integrity office about how to proceed.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the faculty member's identity.

tasks.description: Explain the university's academic integrity process and the faculty member's options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the formal procedure for handling suspected plagiarism.

tasks.description: Schedule a confidential consultation for the faculty member with an academic integrity officer.
